item.title: App Store 中國區下架 WhatsApp 和 Threads 等應用程序
item.description:
本週五，蘋果已從 App Store 中國區商店中下架了 Meta 旗下的 WhatsApp 和 Threads 等應用程序，同時被下架的還有即時通訊應用程序 Telegram 和 Signal。蘋果公司稱：「我們有義務遵守業務所在國家的法律，即使是在我們有不同意見時。」

On Friday, Apple has removed Meta-owned applications such as WhatsApp and Threads from the App Store in the Chinese region. Additionally, instant messaging applications Telegram and Signal were also taken down. Apple stated, 「We have an obligation to comply with the laws of the countries in which we operate, even if we may disagree.」
